alert.note: Alert for Lawrence (Missouri) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued May 14 at 2:58PM CDT until May 14 at 3:15PM CDT by NWS Springfield
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 315 PM CDT FOR SOUTHEASTERN LAWRENCE COUNTY... At 257 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Mount Vernon, moving north at 15 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Aurora, Mount Vernon, Verona, Freistatt, Hoberg and Chesapeake. This includes Interstate 44 between mile markers 42 and 50. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
